collection.heading: Collection
collection.text: Lists are a continuous group of text or images. They are composed of items containing primary and supplemental actions, which are represented by icons and text. This component consists of multiple interacting components (@collection and @collectionItem).

simpleCollection.heading: Simple collection
simpleCollection.text: Just a plain and simple collection.

compressedCollection.heading: Compressed collection
compressedCollection.text: A more efficient way of displaying collections, when considering space.

alignedCollectionItem.heading: Align collection item contents
alignedCollectionItem.text: You should change the list item alignment when displaying 3 lines or more.

collectionControls.heading: List item controls
collectionControls.text: You can add custom controls to the list item, this can be a checkbox, radio etc.

collectionSubheaders.heading: List subheaders
collectionSubheaders.subHeading: Subheaders provide context to large collections spanning multiple topics.
